experience.title: Data Science Engineer
experience.description: -Developed an automated end-to-end delivery of module reports using SQL, Unix scripting, and Excel, achieving a remarkable threefold efficiency boost.-Managed project lifecycles, gathering requirements, Designing, Developing, Testing, & documenting Change Requests for client needs and ongoing issues.-Created a control framework environment using SQL and Tableau for Data Visualization to verify the efficiency and accuracy of reports for each module.-Demonstrated expertise in managing end-to-end migration processes, Optimizing Code efficiency, and ensuring a smooth transition to Hadoop infrastructure.-Utilized PySpark for effective Data processing, highlighting proficiency in Big Data technologies.-Developed Abinitio graphs for Partner offers generation, enhancing the efficiency of offer generation processes for our customers.-Engineered an Abinitio graph within the ETL team to identify and exclude customers posing Potential or Reputational Risks.-Successfully led the migration of Informatica jobs to Abinitio Jobs, streamlining Data processing and ensuring seamless transition between ETL platforms.
experience.description_html: -Developed an automated end-to-end delivery of module reports using SQL, Unix scripting, and Excel, achieving a remarkable threefold efficiency boost.-Managed project lifecycles, gathering requirements, Designing, Developing, Testing, & documenting Change Requests for client needs and ongoing issues.-Created a control framework environment using SQL and Tableau for Data Visualization to verify the efficiency and accuracy of reports for each module.-Demonstrated expertise in managing end-to-end migration processes, Optimizing Code efficiency, and ensuring a smooth transition to Hadoop infrastructure.-Utilized PySpark for effective Data processing, highlighting proficiency in Big Data technologies.-Developed Abinitio graphs for Partner offers generation, enhancing the efficiency of offer generation processes for our customers.-Engineered an Abinitio graph within the ETL team to identify and exclude customers posing Potential or Reputational Risks.-Successfully led the migration of Informatica jobs to Abinitio Jobs, streamlining Data processing and ensuring seamless transition between ETL platforms.

experience.title: Graduate Intern
experience.description: -Developed Java- based Query Automation Engine for the Digital team. Created a user-friendly web app to identify and resolve data issues in Online Mobile Banking.-Implemented a Java script to automate API-based property file downloads. Utilized JDBC for efficient Database Connectivity and querying to identify error code root causes.
experience.description_html: -Developed Java- based Query Automation Engine for the Digital team. Created a user-friendly web app to identify and resolve data issues in Online Mobile Banking.-Implemented a Java script to automate API-based property file downloads. Utilized JDBC for efficient Database Connectivity and querying to identify error code root causes. <!---->
